author: Simyon264
install_msg: Successfully installed the SS14 OOC relay cog! Get started by runing `!addrelay`
name: SS14 OOC relay
short: Relays OOC messages from SS14 servers to Discord and vice versa.
description: Relays OOC messages from SS14 servers to Discord and vice versa. Requires a server running Space Station 14 with the ooc relay enabled.
